seo.title: Ligne Carré Inc. – Architect in Montreal | Architecture & Project Management
seo.description: Ligne Carré Inc. provides architectural design, interior design and full project management services in Montreal. Human, precise and accessible expertise for residential, Institutional, commercial and Cultural / Sports projects.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Ligne Carré Inc. is a firm specialized in architecture and project management, offering innovative, functional, and personalized solutions for residential, institutional, sports, and commercial projects. With strong international expertise, our company promotes an approach that combines creativity, technical precision, and rigorous compliance with current standards.
story.paragraph2: Based in Montreal, Ligne Carré Inc. accompanies its clients at every stage: from architectural design to completion, while ensuring cost optimization, respect for deadlines, and adaptation to the specific needs of each project. We are committed to contributing to sustainable urban development and improving the quality of the built environment.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: Ligne Carré Inc. positions itself as your trusted partner in architecture and project management in Quebec. We offer comprehensive, flexible, and customized services to transform your ideas into concrete projects—whether residential, commercial, or institutional buildings.
philosophy.paragraph2: Our approach is based on a combination of innovation, technical expertise, and a human and accessible approach. We do everything in our power to ensure the success of each stage: design, coordination, construction monitoring, and delivery. At Ligne Carré Inc., we are committed to respecting deadlines, controlling budgets, and exceeding your expectations. Discover our portfolio and see how we bring to life projects that stand out for their quality, precision, and impact.

member.name: Fadi Abou-Sader
member.title: Architect OAQ – Project Manager | MGPA
member.bio: Fadi Abou-Sader is an architect, member of the Ordre des Architectes du Québec (OAQ) and the Order of Architects of Beirut, with over 28 years of experience in Lebanon, Quebec, and the MENA region.
member.founder: A graduate of the Lebanese Academy of Fine Arts and holder of a master's degree in project setup and management from the University of Montreal, he has led residential, institutional, and sports projects, combining innovative architecture and rigorous management. As the founder of Ligne Carré Inc., he accompanies his clients from the first sketch to final delivery, with a human, accessible approach focused on precision—because every line counts.

interior.title: Interior Design

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Ligne Carré Inc. ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and any messages you send through our contact form. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our website.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, provide our services, improve our website, and communicate with you about our services. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, provided they agree to keep this information confidential. We may also disclose information if required by law.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt-out of certain communications from us. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided on our contact page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@lignecarre.com or through our contact page.
